channel.title: Monerica - Newest and Sponsored Listings
channel.description: The latest additions and sponsors in our directory.

item.title: JackAni
item.description: Businesses > Luxury Goods : Online jewelry retailer based in the USA, specializing in high-quality gold jewelry. Offering a range of products like graduation rings, birthstone rings, religious jewelry, and more. Emphasizing honest pricing and craftsmanship, with all items made in America using solid gold. - Note: Select "Bitcoin & Crypto" payment method during checkout. On the "Thank you" page, click on "Complete Payment" to open up payment QR Code. Monero is default, along with other options available. - Location: Los Angeles, CA - Processor: BTCPay Server - Contact: sales@jackani.com
